title: 2-in-1 Teaspoon Clip
subTitle: A spoon has never been so useful.

marketingArguments.title: Designed for Tea & Coffee
marketingArguments.speech: Simple, design & efficient, this spoon will quickly integrate your daily life. Over is the time, looking for a way to close the tea or coffee ground bag. Now just use your spoon. Their timeless, stainless steel design measure just the right amount of tea or coffee, for a delicious cup every time
